message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, no need to negotiate
I'll give you a good chunk, but I think I deserve more for taking on the risk of negotiation
You think you deserve more for taking on the risk of negotiation? I'm not convinced yet!
You're taking on the risk, but I'm still the one who has to live with the outcome. I'm willing to give you a bit less, but not that much less
You're not giving me enough, I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal
Still too close to the previous offer, I'm not willing to give you more than 55% of the total
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not going to give you more than 55% of the total. This is my final offer
